headline: What Everest Group (EG)'s Profit Rebound Amid Lower Revenue Means For Shareholders
summary: In early February 2026, Everest Group, Ltd. reported past fourth-quarter 2025 revenue of US$4.42 billion, down from US$4.64 billion a year earlier, while turning a prior net loss into net income of US$446 million and lifting full-year earnings per share. Alongside these results, the company continued reshaping its capital and risk profile, completing a very large, long-running buyback program and emphasizing profitability over growth in less attractive insurance lines. We’ll now examine...
